name: The brow fox jumps over the lazy dog
name_original: The brow fox jumps over the lazy dog
description:
Second participation to Week challenge contest.

I continue my experiments with Paint in game. I have a facebook page with my drawings : https://www.facebook.com/PouletVert/

I'm looking for a pipeline as simple as Paint to make my games. So I'm creating some simple scripts that I can use another time in a diffrent situation. My Goal isn't to create a good game (not yet), but to create something I feel cool with.
